price: Abͻfoͻ no kaa sε: ”Daabi, yεde (asotwee) a wͻn adwen nnsi wͻn pi wͻ ho no na yεde aba wo hͻ.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
